Protocols/TimePeriodGroup.html#/s:vP5Tod.name: startDate
Protocols/TimePeriodGroup.html#/s:vP5Tod.abstract: The start date of a group representing the earliest date of the time periods

Protocols/TimePeriodGroup.html#/s:vP5Tod.name: endDate
Protocols/TimePeriodGroup.html#/s:vP5Tod.abstract: The end date of a group representing the latest date of the time periods

Protocols/TimePeriodGroup.html#/s:FP5Tod.name: duration(in:)
Protocols/TimePeriodGroup.html#/s:FP5Tod.abstract: Returns the duration of the receiver in given TimePeriodSize

Protocols/TimePeriodGroup.html#/s:FP5Tod.name: shiftLater(with:amount:)
Protocols/TimePeriodGroup.html#/s:FP5Tod.abstract: Shifts all TimePeriod objects later by a given size amount. Amount multiplies size.

Protocols/TimePeriodGroup.html#/s:FP5Tod.name: shiftEarlier(with:amount:)
Protocols/TimePeriodGroup.html#/s:FP5Tod.abstract: Shifts all TimePeriod objects earlier by a given size amount. Amount multiplies size.

Protocols/TimePeriodGroup.html#/s:FP5Tod.name: hasSameCharacteristicsAs(timePeriodGroup:)
Protocols/TimePeriodGroup.html#/s:FP5Tod.abstract: Checks whether given TimePeriodGroup has the same startDate, endDate and number of TimePeriod objects

Extensions/Date.html#/s:ZvE5TodayV10Foun.name: defaultCalendarIdentifier
Extensions/Date.html#/s:ZvE5TodayV10Foun.abstract: Retrieves the default calendar identifier used for all non-calendar-specified operations

Extensions/Date.html#/s:vE5TodayV10Found.name: era
Extensions/Date.html#/s:vE5TodayV10Found.abstract: Returns the era of the receiver. (0 for BC, 1 for AD for Gregorian)

Extensions/Date.html#/s:vE5TodayV10Found.name: year
Extensions/Date.html#/s:vE5TodayV10Found.abstract: Returns the year of the receiver.

Extensions/Date.html#/s:vE5TodayV10Found.name: month
Extensions/Date.html#/s:vE5TodayV10Found.abstract: Returns the month of the year of the receiver.

Extensions/Date.html#/s:vE5TodayV10Found.name: day
Extensions/Date.html#/s:vE5TodayV10Found.abstract: Returns the day of the month of the receiver.

Extensions/Date.html#/s:vE5TodayV10Found.name: hour
Extensions/Date.html#/s:vE5TodayV10Found.abstract: Returns the hour of the day of the receiver. (0-24)

Extensions/Date.html#/s:vE5TodayV10Found.name: minute
Extensions/Date.html#/s:vE5TodayV10Found.abstract: Returns the minute of the receiver. (0-59)

Extensions/Date.html#/s:vE5TodayV10Found.name: second
Extensions/Date.html#/s:vE5TodayV10Found.abstract: Returns the second of the receiver. (0-59)

Extensions/Date.html#/s:vE5TodayV10Found.name: weekday
Extensions/Date.html#/s:vE5TodayV10Found.abstract: Returns the day of the week of the receiver.

Extensions/Date.html#/s:vE5TodayV10Found.name: weekdayName
Extensions/Date.html#/s:vE5TodayV10Found.abstract: Returns the day of the week of the receiver.

Extensions/Date.html#/s:vE5TodayV10Found.name: weekdayOrdinal
Extensions/Date.html#/s:vE5TodayV10Found.abstract: Returns the ordinal for the day of the week of the receiver.

Extensions/Date.html#/s:vE5TodayV10Found.name: quarter
Extensions/Date.html#/s:vE5TodayV10Found.abstract: Returns the quarter of the receiver.

Extensions/Date.html#/s:vE5TodayV10Found.name: weekOfMonth
Extensions/Date.html#/s:vE5TodayV10Found.abstract: Returns the week of the month of the receiver.

Extensions/Date.html#/s:vE5TodayV10Found.name: weekOfYear
Extensions/Date.html#/s:vE5TodayV10Found.abstract: Returns the week of the year of the receiver.

Extensions/Date.html#/s:vE5TodayV10Found.name: yearForWeekOfYear
Extensions/Date.html#/s:vE5TodayV10Found.abstract: I honestly don’t know much about this value…

Extensions/Date.html#/s:vE5TodayV10Found.name: daysInMonth
Extensions/Date.html#/s:vE5TodayV10Found.abstract: Returns how many days are in the month of the receiver.

Extensions/Date.html#/s:vE5TodayV10Found.name: dayOfYear
Extensions/Date.html#/s:vE5TodayV10Found.abstract: Returns the day of the year of the receiver. (1-365 or 1-366 for leap year)

Extensions/Date.html#/s:vE5TodayV10Found.name: daysInYear
Extensions/Date.html#/s:vE5TodayV10Found.abstract: Returns how many days are in the year of the receiver.

Extensions/Date.html#/s:vE5TodayV10Found.name: isInLeapYear
Extensions/Date.html#/s:vE5TodayV10Found.abstract: Returns whether the receiver falls in a leap year.

Extensions/Date.html#/s:FE5TodayV10Found.name: years(from:calendar:)
Extensions/Date.html#/s:FE5TodayV10Found.abstract: Returns an Int representing the amount of time in years between the receiver and the provided date.

Extensions/Date.html#/s:FE5TodayV10Found.name: months(from:calendar:)
Extensions/Date.html#/s:FE5TodayV10Found.abstract: Returns an Int representing the amount of time in months between the receiver and the provided date.

Extensions/Date.html#/s:vE5TodayV10Found.name: yearsUntil
Extensions/Date.html#/s:vE5TodayV10Found.abstract: Returns the number of years until the receiver’s date. Returns 0 if the receiver is the same or earlier than now.

Extensions/Date.html#/s:vE5TodayV10Found.name: monthsUntil
Extensions/Date.html#/s:vE5TodayV10Found.abstract: Returns the number of months until the receiver’s date. Returns 0 if the receiver is the same or earlier than now.

Extensions/Date.html#/s:vE5TodayV10Found.name: weeksUntil
Extensions/Date.html#/s:vE5TodayV10Found.abstract: Returns the number of weeks until the receiver’s date. Returns 0 if the receiver is the same or earlier than now.

Extensions/Date.html#/s:vE5TodayV10Found.name: daysUntil
Extensions/Date.html#/s:vE5TodayV10Found.abstract: Returns the number of days until the receiver’s date. Returns 0 if the receiver is the same or earlier than now.

Extensions/Date.html#/s:vE5TodayV10Found.name: hoursUntil
Extensions/Date.html#/s:vE5TodayV10Found.abstract: Returns the number of hours until the receiver’s date. Returns 0 if the receiver is the same or earlier than now.

Extensions/Date.html#/s:vE5TodayV10Found.name: minutesUntil
Extensions/Date.html#/s:vE5TodayV10Found.abstract: Returns the number of minutes until the receiver’s date. Returns 0 if the receiver is the same or earlier than now.

Extensions/Date.html#/s:vE5TodayV10Found.name: secondsUntil
Extensions/Date.html#/s:vE5TodayV10Found.abstract: Returns the number of seconds until the receiver’s date. Returns 0 if the receiver is the same or earlier than now.

Extensions/Date.html#/s:vE5TodayV10Found.name: yearsAgo
Extensions/Date.html#/s:vE5TodayV10Found.abstract: Returns the number of years the receiver’s date is earlier than now. Returns 0 if the receiver is the same or later than now.

Extensions/Date.html#/s:vE5TodayV10Found.name: monthsAgo
Extensions/Date.html#/s:vE5TodayV10Found.abstract: Returns the number of months the receiver’s date is earlier than now. Returns 0 if the receiver is the same or later than now.

Extensions/Date.html#/s:vE5TodayV10Found.name: weeksAgo
Extensions/Date.html#/s:vE5TodayV10Found.abstract: Returns the number of weeks the receiver’s date is earlier than now. Returns 0 if the receiver is the same or later than now.

Extensions/Date.html#/s:vE5TodayV10Found.name: daysAgo
Extensions/Date.html#/s:vE5TodayV10Found.abstract: Returns the number of days the receiver’s date is earlier than now. Returns 0 if the receiver is the same or later than now.

Extensions/Date.html#/s:vE5TodayV10Found.name: hoursAgo
Extensions/Date.html#/s:vE5TodayV10Found.abstract: Returns the number of hours the receiver’s date is earlier than now. Returns 0 if the receiver is the same or later than now.

Extensions/Date.html#/s:vE5TodayV10Found.name: minutesAgo
Extensions/Date.html#/s:vE5TodayV10Found.abstract: Returns the number of minutes the receiver’s date is earlier than now. Returns 0 if the receiver is the same or later than now.

Extensions/Date.html#/s:vE5TodayV10Found.name: secondsAgo
Extensions/Date.html#/s:vE5TodayV10Found.abstract: Returns the number of seconds the receiver’s date is earlier than now. Returns 0 if the receiver is the same or later than now.

Extensions/Date.html#/s:FE5TodayV10Found.name: yearsEarlier(than:)
Extensions/Date.html#/s:FE5TodayV10Found.abstract: Returns the number of years the receiver’s date is earlier than the provided comparison date.

Extensions/Date.html#/s:FE5TodayV10Found.name: monthsEarlier(than:)
Extensions/Date.html#/s:FE5TodayV10Found.abstract: Returns the number of months the receiver’s date is earlier than the provided comparison date.

Extensions/Date.html#/s:FE5TodayV10Found.name: weeksEarlier(than:)
Extensions/Date.html#/s:FE5TodayV10Found.abstract: Returns the number of weeks the receiver’s date is earlier than the provided comparison date.

Extensions/Date.html#/s:FE5TodayV10Found.name: secondsEarlier(than:)
Extensions/Date.html#/s:FE5TodayV10Found.abstract: Returns the number of seconds the receiver’s date is earlier than the provided comparison date.

Extensions/Date.html#/s:FE5TodayV10Found.name: yearsLater(than:)
Extensions/Date.html#/s:FE5TodayV10Found.abstract: Returns the number of years the receiver’s date is later than the provided comparison date.

Extensions/Date.html#/s:FE5TodayV10Found.name: monthsLater(than:)

Extensions/Date.html#/s:FE5TodayV10Found.name: weeksLater(than:)
Extensions/Date.html#/s:FE5TodayV10Found.abstract: Returns the number of weeks the receiver’s date is later than the provided comparison date.

Extensions/Date.html#/s:FE5TodayV10Found.name: hoursLater(than:)

Extensions/Date.html#/s:FE5TodayV10Found.name: minutesLater(than:)
Extensions/Date.html#/s:FE5TodayV10Found.abstract: Returns the number of minutes the receiver’s date is later than the provided comparison date.

Extensions/Date.html#/s:FE5TodayV10Found.name: secondsLater(than:)
Extensions/Date.html#/s:FE5TodayV10Found.abstract: Returns the number of seconds the receiver’s date is later than the provided comparison date.

Extensions/Date.html#/s:FE5TodayV10Found.name: isEarlier(than:)
Extensions/Date.html#/s:FE5TodayV10Found.abstract: Returns a YES if receiver is earlier than provided comparison date, otherwise returns NO

Extensions/Date.html#/s:FE5TodayV10Found.name: isLater(than:)
Extensions/Date.html#/s:FE5TodayV10Found.abstract: Returns a YES if receiver is later than provided comparison date, otherwise returns NO

Extensions/Date.html#/s:FE5TodayV10Found.name: isEarlierThanOrEqualTo(_:)
Extensions/Date.html#/s:FE5TodayV10Found.abstract: Returns a YES if receiver is earlier than or equal to the provided comparison date, otherwise returns NO

Extensions/Date.html#/s:FE5TodayV10Found.name: isLaterThanOrEqualTo(_:)
Extensions/Date.html#/s:FE5TodayV10Found.abstract: Returns a YES if receiver is later than or equal to provided comparison date, otherwise returns NO

Extensions/Date.html#/s:FE5TodayV10Found.name: isEqualTo(_:)
Extensions/Date.html#/s:FE5TodayV10Found.abstract: Returns a YES if receiver is equal to provided comparison date, otherwise returns NO

Extensions/Date.html#/s:FE5TodayV10Found.name: formattedDate(withStyle:)
Extensions/Date.html#/s:FE5TodayV10Found.abstract: Convenience method that returns a formatted string representing the receiver’s date formatted to a given style

Extensions/Date.html#/s:FE5TodayV10Found.name: formattedDate(withStyle:timeZone:)
Extensions/Date.html#/s:FE5TodayV10Found.abstract: Convenience method that returns a formatted string representing the receiver’s date formatted to a given style and time zone

Extensions/Date.html#/s:FE5TodayV10Found.name: formattedDate(withStyle:locale:)
Extensions/Date.html#/s:FE5TodayV10Found.abstract: Convenience method that returns a formatted string representing the receiver’s date formatted to a given style and locale

Extensions/Date.html#/s:FE5TodayV10Found.name: formattedDate(withStyle:timeZone:locale:)
Extensions/Date.html#/s:FE5TodayV10Found.abstract: Convenience method that returns a formatted string representing the receiver’s date formatted to a given style, time zone and locale

Extensions/Date.html#/s:FE5TodayV10Found.name: formattedDate(withFormat:)
Extensions/Date.html#/s:FE5TodayV10Found.abstract: Convenience method that returns a formatted string representing the receiver’s date formatted to a given date format

Extensions/Date.html#/s:FE5TodayV10Found.name: formattedDate(withFormat:timeZone:)
Extensions/Date.html#/s:FE5TodayV10Found.abstract: Convenience method that returns a formatted string representing the receiver’s date formatted to a given date format and time zone

Extensions/Date.html#/s:FE5TodayV10Found.name: formattedDate(withFormat:locale:)
Extensions/Date.html#/s:FE5TodayV10Found.abstract: Convenience method that returns a formatted string representing the receiver’s date formatted to a given date format and locale

Extensions/Date.html#/s:FE5TodayV10Found.name: formattedDate(withFormat:timeZone:locale:)
Extensions/Date.html#/s:FE5TodayV10Found.abstract: Convenience method that returns a formatted string representing the receiver’s date formatted to a given date format, time zone and locale

Classes/TimePeriodCollection.html#/s:vC5.name: startDate
Classes/TimePeriodCollection.html#/s:vC5.abstract: The start date of TimePeriodCollection representing the earliest date of TimePeriod objects.

Classes/TimePeriodCollection.html#/s:vC5.name: endDate
Classes/TimePeriodCollection.html#/s:vC5.abstract: The end date of TimePeriodCollection representing the latest date of TimePeriod objects.

Classes/TimePeriodCollection.html#/s:FC5.name: init(calendar:)
Classes/TimePeriodCollection.html#/s:FC5.abstract: Initializes an instance of TimePeriodCollection using given calendar

Classes/TimePeriodCollection.html#/s:FC5.name: sortByDurationAscending()
Classes/TimePeriodCollection.html#/s:FC5.abstract: Sorts collection by TimePeriod duration in ascending order

Classes/TimePeriodCollection.html#/s:FC5.name: sortByDurationDescending()
Classes/TimePeriodCollection.html#/s:FC5.abstract: Sorts collection by TimePeriod duration in descending order

Classes/TimePeriodCollection.html#/s:FC5.name: equals(_:considerOrder:)
Classes/TimePeriodCollection.html#/s:FC5.abstract: Compares given TimePeriodCollection to the receiver and returns whether they are equal. Comparison can be done with order considering or without.

Classes/TimePeriodChain.html#/s:vC5Today.name: startDate
Classes/TimePeriodChain.html#/s:vC5Today.abstract: The start date of TimePeriodChain representing the starting boundary of the TimePeriodChain

Classes/TimePeriodChain.html#/s:vC5Today.name: endDate
Classes/TimePeriodChain.html#/s:vC5Today.abstract: The end date of TimePeriodChain representing the ending boundary of the TimePeriodChain

Classes/TimePeriodChain.html#/s:FC5Today.name: init(calendar:)
Classes/TimePeriodChain.html#/s:FC5Today.abstract: Initializes an instance of TimePeriodChain using given calendar

Classes/TimePeriodChain.html#/s:FC5Today.name: add(timePeriod:)
Classes/TimePeriodChain.html#/s:FC5Today.abstract: Appends given TimePeriod object at the end of the chain. This modifies startDate and endDate of TimePeriod to fit the chain.

Classes/TimePeriodChain.html#/s:FC5Today.name: insert(timePeriod:atIndex:)
Classes/TimePeriodChain.html#/s:FC5Today.abstract: Inserts given TimePeriod object at given index. Side effect of this method depends on index at which item is inserted.

Classes/TimePeriodChain.html#/s:FC5Today.name: remove(atIndex:)
Classes/TimePeriodChain.html#/s:FC5Today.abstract: Removes TimePeriod object at given index from the chain. This method shifts earlier all TimePeriod objects that have higher index than index given by the parameter, by duration of removed TimePeriod object.

Classes/TimePeriodChain.html#/s:FC5Today.name: removeEarliestTimePeriod()
Classes/TimePeriodChain.html#/s:FC5Today.abstract: Removes earliest TimePeriod object from the chain. This method shifts earlier all TimePeriod objects in the chain, so that startDate stays the same.

Classes/TimePeriodChain.html#/s:FC5Today.name: equals(_:)
Classes/TimePeriodChain.html#/s:FC5Today.abstract: Compares given TimePeriodChain to the receiver and returns whether they are equal.

Classes/TimePeriod.html#/s:vC5Today10Tim.name: startDate
Classes/TimePeriod.html#/s:vC5Today10Tim.abstract: The start date for a TimePeriod representing the starting boundary of the time period

Classes/TimePeriod.html#/s:vC5Today10Tim.name: endDate
Classes/TimePeriod.html#/s:vC5Today10Tim.abstract: The end date for a TimePeriod representing the ending boundary of the time period

Classes/TimePeriod.html#/s:FC5Today10Tim.name: init(startDate:endDate:calendar:)
Classes/TimePeriod.html#/s:FC5Today10Tim.abstract: Initializes an instance of TimePeriod from a given start and end date

Classes/TimePeriod.html#/s:FC5Today10Tim.name: init(size:amount:startingAt:calendar:)
Classes/TimePeriod.html#/s:FC5Today10Tim.abstract: Returns a new instance of TimePeriod that starts on the provided start date and is of the size provided. The amount represents a multipler to the size (e.g. 2 weeks or 4 years)

Classes/TimePeriod.html#/s:FC5Today10Tim.name: init(size:amount:endingAt:calendar:)
Classes/TimePeriod.html#/s:FC5Today10Tim.abstract: Returns a new instance of TimePeriod that ends on the provided end date

Classes/TimePeriod.html#/s:ZFC5Today10Ti.name: timePeriodWithAllTime()
Classes/TimePeriod.html#/s:ZFC5Today10Ti.abstract: Returns a new instance of TimePeriod that represents the largest time period available.

Classes/TimePeriod.html#/s:FC5Today10Tim.name: isMoment()
Classes/TimePeriod.html#/s:FC5Today10Tim.abstract: Returns a boolean representing whether the receiver is a moment, that is the start and end dates are the same.

Classes/TimePeriod.html#/s:FC5Today10Tim.name: equals(_:)
Classes/TimePeriod.html#/s:FC5Today10Tim.abstract: Returns a Bool representing whether the receiver’s start and end dates exatcly match a given time period

Classes/TimePeriod.html#/s:FC5Today10Tim.name: isInside(period:)
Classes/TimePeriod.html#/s:FC5Today10Tim.abstract: Returns a Bool representing whether the receiver’s start and end dates exatcly match a given time period or is contained within them

Classes/TimePeriod.html#/s:FC5Today10Tim.name: contains(period:)
Classes/TimePeriod.html#/s:FC5Today10Tim.abstract: Returns a Bool representing whether the given time period’s start and end dates exatcly match the receivers’ or is contained within them

Classes/TimePeriod.html#/s:FC5Today10Tim.name: overlapsWith(period:)
Classes/TimePeriod.html#/s:FC5Today10Tim.abstract: Returns a Bool representing whether the receiver and the given time period overlap.

Classes/TimePeriod.html#/s:FC5Today10Tim.name: intersects(period:)
Classes/TimePeriod.html#/s:FC5Today10Tim.abstract: Returns a Bool representing whether the receiver and the given time period overlap.

Classes/TimePeriod.html#/s:FC5Today10Tim.name: shiftEarlier(withSize:amount:)
Classes/TimePeriod.html#/s:FC5Today10Tim.abstract: Shifts the startDate and endDate earlier by a given size amount. Amount multiplies size.

Classes/TimePeriod.html#/s:FC5Today10Tim.name: shiftLater(withSize:amount:)
Classes/TimePeriod.html#/s:FC5Today10Tim.abstract: Shifts the startDate and endDate later by a given size amount. Amount multiplies size.

Classes/TimePeriod.html#/s:FC5Today10Tim.name: lengthen(withAnchor:size:amount:)
Classes/TimePeriod.html#/s:FC5Today10Tim.abstract: Lengthens the receiver by a given amount, anchored by a provided point. Amount multiplies size.

Classes/TimePeriod.html#/s:FC5Today10Tim.name: shorten(withAnchor:size:amount:)
Classes/TimePeriod.html#/s:FC5Today10Tim.abstract: Shortens the receiver by a given amount, anchored by a provided point. Amount multiplies size.
